Text:
Just a note ppl, I think I'm going to stick with the version with the asian subtitles, much higher quality and they aren't really much of an issue.

If anyone objects let me know and I'll make lower quality rips without the subtitles available. Just looking to maximize my time and bandwidth.

Just FYI will be upload episodes 3, 4 and 5 later today.
thx for the uploads, I'd actually prefer your rips... besides the other rip can be gotten from other sources

3, 4 and 5 uploaded in mp4 format to save on file size. Same quality as the avi's just smaller file size. Just search for dance academy on TPB to get them.

Working on getting the rest of the eps, found a source where they apparently have already aired so we'll see how many more I can come up with (assuming I can find reliable soures to rip/download from)
